title: Kylie Jenner says she's on 'great terms' with Travis Scott, not dating ex
text:
Kylie Jenner is clearing up rumors surrounding her reported split from rapper Travis Scott.

Interested in Kardashians? Add Kardashians as an interest to stay up to date on the latest Kardashians news, video, and analysis from ABC News. Add Interest

The beauty mogul tweeted on Thursday that she and Scott, who share a 1-year-old daughter, Stormi, "are on great terms" and that Stormi is their "priority."

She also shot down reports that she'd visited her ex, rapper Tyga, at a recording studio in the wee hours of Wednesday morning.

"There was no '2am date with Tyga,'" she tweeted. "You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at."

The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is. There was no “2am date with Tyga”. You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at. — Kylie Jenner (@KylieJenner) October 3, 2019

Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi ‼️ our friendship and our daughter is priority — Kylie Jenner (@KylieJenner) October 3, 2019

Jenner, 22, and Scott, 28, began dating in April 2017, shortly after her relationship with Tyga ended. The "Keeping Up With the Kardashians" star and Scott, whose legal name is Jacques Webster II, welcomed their daughter, Stormi Webster, the following February.

Though Jenner posted cozy photos with Scott throughout the summer, the two have not been photographed together in a few weeks. TMZ reported on Tuesday that they were taking a break.

A representative for Jenner did not respond to a request for comment; Scott's representative had no comment.
description: Kylie Jenner is clearing up rumors surrounding her reported split from rapper Travis Scott.
